title: Induction - bar on slanted rails in B field

content.question: (a) Indicate whether the magnitude of the acceleration of the bar increases, decreases, or stays the same as the bar begins moving down the rails. _____ Increases _____ Decreases _____ Stays the same Justify your selection without manipulating equations.

(b) Some time after its release, the bar is moving with speed v down the rails.
